props.altLabels: Places the labels beneath the step.
props.hideActions: Hide actions bar (prev and next buttons).
props.itemTitle: Property on supplied `items` that contains its title.
props.itemValue: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value.
props.mobile: Forces the stepper into a mobile state, removing labels from stepper items.
props.nextText: The text used for the Next button.
props.prevText: The text used for the Prev button.
props.nonLinear: Allow user to jump to any step.

slots.[`header-item.${string}`]: Slot for customizing header items when using the [items](/api/v-stepper/#props-items) prop.
slots.[`item.${string}`]: Slot for customizing the content for each step.
slots.header-item: Slot for customizing all header items.
slots.icon: Slot for customizing all stepper item icons.
slots.next: Slot for customizing the next step functionality
slots.prev: Slot for customizing the prev step functionality
